name: Thomson Paediatric Centre - Punggol (康盛儿科诊所) (Waterway Point) by Dr Kenneth Chua Yong Yeow

reviews.text: Dr. Kenneth was very welcoming and made our baby very comfortable. He is professional at what he does and diagnoses properly. He went out of the way to accommodate us. The staff there were also very friendly. Thank you !

Dr Kenneth is an amazing doctor and we all love him! His consults are always very detailed and he explains everything to ensure that you leave his clinic with a peaceful mind knowing how to attend to your kids. The staffs there are just as amazing and go to the extra mile in providing customer service and are always oh so friendly. Definitely my go to clinic for my kids.

Thank you to all the nurses at Dr Chua’s clinic, especially Alice for the exceptional care and dedication she provides! Her presence makes parents feel assured whenever we see her. She goes above and beyond to ensure the best for every child. Her patience and compassion are unmatched, and she has a way of putting both children and parents at ease during stressful times. Alice is not only attentive to the needs of her young patients but also takes time to guide parents, ensuring they act in their child's best interest. Her caring advice and genuine concern make her an invaluable asset. Thank you, Alice, for your unwavering commitment and kindness!

Dr Kenneth Chua and his team of nurses are really nice, informative, caring, attentive and helpful. We have seen them since my son was a baby and he is 8 this year. Their warmth and care has nver changed.  Choosing their clinic is one of the best choice we have ever made.

Here my honest review about this clinic, I wish I can give  Doctor Chua 5 ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ but Google only rate overall for the clinic. Doctor Chua was an amazing Doctor! He's the best compare all the pedia i go before (like a lot ), I have met lots of Paediatrician already , Is just I have compare Doctor Chua  as a very kind doctor and have a very big patience to all your queries he will let you feel comfortable too!

Ok I give 2 star because of the receptionist. The one who always do the billing (especially) she is rude. She don't like repeating questions ,she will show irritated face at you which is so rude. Well I never say anything until I go back again bring my child and here she is again she's just so irritated. I don't think she fits this job , if you don't have patience then at least act nice . I can't just control my self not to review.

Doctor Chua still the best.

Except their reception.
